name: Cap'n Jarls Coin Crusade
description:
*WARNING*
There is currently a crash-bug in the WebGL build.  It's probably fixed now, but please report if you still encounter it.  PC build should be relatively immune.

Y'arrr collect the treasure on each level as fast you can!

Click or click and drag to move.

Long-press to tell a crewmate to dig!

If you lose all your crewmates, or your captain, you it's game over!
